hackathon-description-text: Local tech thinkers and Montreal Yelpers are invited to team up to experiment with Yelp's data to make projects aimed at improving Montreal life. The Yackathon will feature an opening party Friday evening, February 6. There will be free bites and sips from local businesses, and a closing party February 8 where our Yackathon winners will be named! Prizes include $1000 cash, a chef-prepared dinner of local yak steaks, and more. For more information and to RSVP, go to
hackathon-eligibility: Anyone in Montreal who RSVPs, receives a confirmation, agrees to the Terms and Conditions, and comes to the Friday, 6th 2015 6-8pm pitch party to register with a team can participate.
hackathon-requirements: You must submit your project on ChallengePost by 6pm Feb 8th, 2015. We'd like to see links to projects on GitHub, as well as screenshots and a detailed description.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each member of the team awarded the Funniest Hack Prize will receive a gift bag full of local Montreal products. Members will also be invited to a private coffee hour with investors and advisors from Real Ventures. They will also be invited to a private cocktail party with Yelp Elites.

Each member of the team awarded the Most Useful Hack Prize will receive a gift bag full of local Montreal products. Members will also be invited to a private coffee hour with investors and advisors from Real Ventures. They will also be invited to a private cocktail party with Yelp Elites.

Each member of the team awarded the Coolest Hack Prize will receive a gift bag full of local Montreal products. Members will also be invited to a private coffee hour with investors and advisors from Real Ventures. They will also be invited to a private cocktail party with Yelp Elites.

The team that wins the Grand Prize will share a $1000 cash prize. They will also win locally farmed Yak steaks sponsored by Provender, which will be prepared for the winners by Chef David Ferguson at Resto GUS at a private supper with wine pairings.

hackathon-description-header: Yelp’s very first ever, weekend-long Yackathon is coming and we want you involved.
